snippet: The border attack in the Sinai Peninsula is why Egypt’s new Islamist leader has to establish control over the lawless Sinai and work with Israel to do so.
abstract: Editorial maintains attack in the Sinai Peninsula, in which masked gunmen stormed a border post and killed 16 Egyptian soldiers, is why Egypt’s Islamist leader, Pres Mohamed Morsi, has to establish control over the lawless Sinai border and work with Israel to do so.
lead_paragraph: The border attack in the Sinai Peninsula is why Egypt’s new Islamist leader has to establish control over the lawless Sinai and work with Israel to do so.
